name: pretzel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hard salty biscuit that has been baked in a stick or knot shape: Don't eat too many salty snacks like crisps or pretzels.
Karl Newedel/StockFood Creative/GettyImages
soft bread that has been baked in a twisted or knot shape: The pretzel is sliced horizontally and buttered.
Yin Jiang/EyeEm/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI hardly ate, except for a few nuts or pretzels.He apparently choked on a pretzel.After the crash the car was twisted like a pretzel.They sell beautiful loaves and pretzels.
